body_content.explanation: any of various types of fish found among rocks, or the flesh of this type of fish:
examples: Large numbers of rockfish, including bocaccio and widow rockfish, can be seen swimming in the pools.
We recommend eating rockfish at most once a week.

body_content.explanation: a silver fish with stripes on its side that can be eaten, found along the coasts and in the rivers of North America, or the flesh of this type of fish:
examples: The fish - morone saxatilis to the biologist, rock fish to a southerner - are found in these waters.
